data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wilson, George D. F. (2008): A review of taxonomic concepts in the Nannoniscidae (Isopoda, Asellota), with a key to the genera and a description of Nannoniscus oblongus Sars. Zootaxa 1680: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180391
